title: How to Watch Yellowstone’s Final Episodes Online
description: Giddy-up, Yellowstone fans: Season 5, Part 2 of the Taylor Sheridan drama is hitting streaming. Here’s how you can watch every episode of Yellowstone online. How to Watch Yellowstone Season 5, Part 2 Online Three months after Paramount Network aired Yellowstone’s finale, Season 5, Part 2 is coming to Peacock on Sunday, March 16. All previous seasons of […]
author: Claire Franken
excerpt: 'Yellowstone' Season 5, Part 2 is coming to streaming — here's how to watch every episode of the Paramount Network drama online.
text: All products and services featured are independently chosen by editors. However, TVLine may receive a commission on orders placed through its retail links, and the retailer may receive certain auditable data for accounting purposes. Giddy-up, Yellowstone fans: Season 5, Part 2 of the Taylor Sheridan drama is hitting streaming. Here’s how you can watch every episode of Yellowstone online. How to Watch Yellowstone Season 5, Part 2 Online Three months after Paramount Network aired Yellowstone’s finale, Season 5, Part 2 is coming to Peacock on Sunday, March 16. All previous seasons of the series, originally led by Kevin Costner, are already available to stream via Peacock. Below, we’re outlining everything you need to know about how to sign up for Peacock to watch Yellowstone online. Courtesy of PeacockWatch ‘Yellowstone’ on Peacock How to Watch Yellowstone: Peacock Premium Peacock offers two subscriptions options, the first being Peacock Premium. If you don’t mind sitting through some ads while streaming library content, sign up for the Premium plan for $7.99/month or $79.99/year. With this plan, you can watch Yellowstone Season 5, Part 2 and, of course, catch up on every prior episode. There is no commitment with the Peacock Premium plan, so simply sign up to binge Yellowstone Season 5, Part 2 and cancel your subscription once you’ve finished. How to Watch Yellowstone: Peacock Premium Plus If you want to upgrade to the Peacock Premium Plus plan to enjoy ad-free streaming, the ability to download titles for on-the-go viewing and access to your local NBC channel live, you can do so for $13.99/month or $139.99/year. This plan also is commitment-free, so simply cancel after the third season ends to avoid paying for future months. Of, course the complete Yellowstone series will be available to stream with this plan on Sunday, March 16, as they are to all Peacock subscribers. How to Sign Up for Peacock Signing up for Peacock to watch Yellowstone Season 5, Part 2 is easy. Below, we’re outlining step-by-step instructions for subscribing to Peacock in time to catch all the reality TV action: Go to the Peacock website Click “Pick a Plan” to claim the deal Select a monthly or annual Premium or Premium Plus subscription plan Enter user information including name, email and birth date Enter payment information Start streaming Yellowstone on Peacock! Where to Watch Yellowstone Season 5, Part 2 Yellowstone’s final episodes are streaming exclusively on Peacock starting Sunday, March 16. Yellowstone episodes have streamed on Paramount+ in the past, but the entire series is now streaming only on Peacock Unfortunately, Peacock does not currently offer a free trial, so there is no way to watch Yellowstone for free. Peacock free trials have been offered in the past, however, so if you really want to try out the streamer before you buy, check our Peacock FAQ page for all the updates on free trials and more Peacock perks. If you want to watch Yellowstone for free-ish, you can sign up for an Instacart subscription to receive a free Peacock subscription. Of course, you’re still paying for Instacart, but you’ll still be able to watch Yellowstone Season 5, Part 2 online free of charge. (Get details.) How Do I Cancel My Peacock Subscription? Once you’ve binged all the final Yellowstone episodes, you may want to cancel your subscription. If so, cancelling your Peacock plan is simple! Below are step-by-step instructions for terminating your plan: Login to Peacock Click on your avatar, then select “Account” in the upper right hand corner Under “Plans & Payments,” select “Change or Cancel Plan” Scroll to the bottom of the page to select “Cancel Plan” Confirm cancellation and receive your confirmation email Stream Peacock until your billing cycle ends and your subscription is over!
html:
All products and services featured are independently chosen by editors. However, TVLine may receive a commission on orders placed through its retail links, and the retailer may receive certain auditable data for accounting purposes.

Giddy-up, Yellowstone fans: Season 5, Part 2 of the Taylor Sheridan drama is hitting streaming. Here’s how you can watch every episode of Yellowstone online.

How to Watch Yellowstone Season 5, Part 2 Online

Three months after Paramount Network aired Yellowstone’s finale, Season 5, Part 2 is coming to Peacock on Sunday, March 16. All previous seasons of the series, originally led by Kevin Costner, are already available to stream via Peacock. Below, we’re outlining everything you need to know about how to sign up for Peacock to watch Yellowstone online.

Watch ‘Yellowstone’ on Peacock

How to Watch Yellowstone: Peacock Premium

Peacock offers two subscriptions options, the first being Peacock Premium. If you don’t mind sitting through some ads while streaming library content, sign up for the Premium plan for $7.99/month or $79.99/year. With this plan, you can watch Yellowstone Season 5, Part 2 and, of course, catch up on every prior episode. There is no commitment with the Peacock Premium plan, so simply sign up to binge Yellowstone Season 5, Part 2 and cancel your subscription once you’ve finished.

How to Watch Yellowstone: Peacock Premium Plus

If you want to upgrade to the Peacock Premium Plus plan to enjoy ad-free streaming, the ability to download titles for on-the-go viewing and access to your local NBC channel live, you can do so for $13.99/month or $139.99/year. This plan also is commitment-free, so simply cancel after the third season ends to avoid paying for future months. Of, course the complete Yellowstone series will be available to stream with this plan on Sunday, March 16, as they are to all Peacock subscribers.

How to Sign Up for Peacock

Signing up for Peacock to watch Yellowstone Season 5, Part 2 is easy. Below, we’re outlining step-by-step instructions for subscribing to Peacock in time to catch all the reality TV action:

  1. Go to the Peacock website
  2. Click “Pick a Plan” to claim the deal
  3. Select a monthly or annual Premium or Premium Plus subscription plan
  4. Enter user information including name, email and birth date
  5. Enter payment information
  6. Start streaming Yellowstone on Peacock!

Where to Watch Yellowstone Season 5, Part 2

Yellowstone’s final episodes are streaming exclusively on Peacock starting Sunday, March 16. Yellowstone episodes have streamed on Paramount+ in the past, but the entire series is now streaming only on Peacock

Unfortunately, Peacock does not currently offer a free trial, so there is no way to watch Yellowstone for free. Peacock free trials have been offered in the past, however, so if you really want to try out the streamer before you buy, check our Peacock FAQ page for all the updates on free trials and more Peacock perks.

If you want to watch Yellowstone for free-ish, you can sign up for an Instacart subscription to receive a free Peacock subscription. Of course, you’re still paying for Instacart, but you’ll still be able to watch Yellowstone Season 5, Part 2 online free of charge. (Get details.)

How Do I Cancel My Peacock Subscription?

Once you’ve binged all the final Yellowstone episodes, you may want to cancel your subscription. If so, cancelling your Peacock plan is simple! Below are step-by-step instructions for terminating your plan:

  1. Login to Peacock
  2. Click on your avatar, then select “Account” in the upper right hand corner
  3. Under “Plans & Payments,” select “Change or Cancel Plan”
  4. Scroll to the bottom of the page to select “Cancel Plan”
  5. Confirm cancellation and receive your confirmation email
  6. Stream Peacock until your billing cycle ends and your subscription is over!
